<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

					<e:Image source="dntg_main_line_png" x="-4" y="24"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group id="group3" width="180" height="521" x="360" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
					<e:Image id="icon7" width="172" height="172" y="0" horizontalCenter="0" source="dntg_icon_10_png"/>

					<e:Image id="icon9" width="172" height="172" y="344" horizontalCenter="0" source="dntg_icon_10_png"/>
					<e:Image source="dntg_main_line_png" x="-4" y="24"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group id="group4" width="180" height="521" x="540" y="0">
					<e:Image id="icon10" width="172" height="172" y="0" horizontalCenter="0" source="dntg_icon_10_png"/>
					<e:Image id="icon11" width="172" height="172" y="172" horizontalCenter="0" source="dntg_icon_10_png"/>
					<e:Image id="icon12" width="172" height="172" y="344" horizontalCenter="0" source="dntg_icon_10_png"/>
					<e:Image source="dntg_main_line_png" x="-4" y="24"/>

                    <e:Image id="icon10" width="172" height="172" y="0" horizontalCenter="0" source="dntg_icon_10_png" />
